body: We believe in one God in three persons: the Father, the Son, and the Holy Spirit. Each person is fully God, and there is only one God. We believe that the Bible is the inspired, infallible, and authoritative Word of God. It is the final authority on all matters of faith and practice.
We believe that Jesus Christ is fully God and fully man. His death, burial, and resurrection provide the only means of salvation for humanity.
We believe that salvation is a gift from God, received by faith alone. It cannot be earned through good works or human effort.
We believe in the bodily resurrection of Jesus Christ and the future resurrection of all believers. This resurrection ensures eternal life with God.
We believe that the church is the body of Christ, called to worship God, teach His Word, and serve the world. The church is vital for spiritual growth and fellowship.
We believe that Christians are called to share the gospel message with all people, making disciples of all nations as commanded by Jesus.
We believe that the Holy Spirit empowers believers for service, convicts of sin, and guides in understanding and applying God’s Word.
We believe that once a person is truly saved, they are eternally secure in Christ. Nothing can separate them from the love of God.
We believe in one God in three persons: the Father, the Son, and the Holy Spirit. Each person is fully God, and there is only one God.
We believe that the Bible is the inspired, infallible, and authoritative Word of God. It is the final authority on all matters of faith and practice.
We believe that Jesus Christ is fully God and fully man. His death, burial, and resurrection provide the only means of salvation for humanity.
We believe that salvation is a gift from God, received by faith alone. It cannot be earned through good works or human effort.
We believe in the bodily resurrection of Jesus Christ and the future resurrection of all believers. This resurrection ensures eternal life with God.
We believe that the church is the body of Christ, called to worship God, teach His Word, and serve the world. The church is vital for spiritual growth and fellowship.
We believe that Christians are called to share the gospel message with all people, making disciples of all nations as commanded by Jesus.
We believe that the Holy Spirit empowers believers for service, convicts of sin, and guides in understanding and applying God’s Word.
We believe that once a person is truly saved, they are eternally secure in Christ. Nothing can separate them from the love of God.
We believe in the imminent return of Jesus Christ to establish His kingdom and judge the living and the dead. This future event is a cornerstone of our hope.
